resources.string: A list of free movies streaming from the web

This is a list of free movies streaming from the web.

Tap on categories to expand, tap on titles to start the movie, long press a title to show context menu.

To get rid of ads, choose 'Ad-Free Version' in the menu

To help us make this app known, please rate it on the market

CREDITS:
Film OnLine has been developed by:

Blue Pixel:
Project and realization

Paolo Casillo:
Movie search (since version 1.7) and testing

Film OnLine is in continuous development: if you wish to join the team or send your suggestions, write us a mail.
Reading the movie list, please wait.

DISCLAIMER:\nFilm OnLine collects public links to web contents. All the linked movies are hosted on third parties servers, can be reached by everyone and are not under the responsibility of the developers. To request the removal of a content, please send a mail. Thanks.
Insert movie title (or part of it)
